sentences.sContent: I watched, smiling, knowing how fleeting these moments when they are small are.
sentences.sContent_eng: I watched, smiling, knowing how fleeting these moments when they are small are.
sentences.sCn: 我微笑的看着这一切，我知道这个时刻是多么的短暂。

sentences.sContent: Most touches were only about five seconds, but in these fleeting moments, we’re capable of communicating distinct emotions, just as we are with the face.
sentences.sContent_eng: Most touches were only about five seconds, but in these fleeting moments, we’re capable of communicating distinct emotions, just as we are with the face.
sentences.sCn: 大部分触摸只有五秒左右，然而就是在这么短暂的时间里，我们有能力传达明确的情绪，正像我们通过表情所做的那样。

phrases.pCn: 佛里特街（英国几家报馆办事处所在地）；伦敦报业；伦敦新闻界

remMethod.val: 舰队(fleet)遇到问题赶紧逃跑(flee)
